content: **errata** the stitch count after round 1 should be 45 not 40 ------- this is a pattern of a star it consists of a small central star with the possibility of adding more and more row the star keeps its shape after every row so you can make it as large as you like hence the name growing star the level is intermediate because i used one special stitch for the corners which is explained in the pattern with pictures otherwise it is very straightforward the pattern contains written instructions for the central star the first few rounds and a recipe on how to keep adding more rounds you can use any yarn as long as you use a hook to match **copyright** growing star by meta van essen is licensed under a creative commons attribution-noncommercial-noderivs 3 0 unported license 2 you can find the terms of the license in the link provided in short you must attribute this pattern to me with a link to http //homemadebymeta blogspot nl/2013/11/growing-heart html you may not use this work for commercial purposes and you may not alter transform or build upon this work note the above only applies to the written *pattern* i have absolutely no control over what you wish to do with any fos keep them gift them sell them anything you wish
